column17: Mob was wearing red shirts, newspaper described them as 'disguised bloody shirt' men, from an 11/10/98 e-mail message from  Bruce Baker (bebaker@mail.awod.com)
column36: from an 11/10/98 e-mail message from  Bruce Baker (bebaker@mail.awod.com)

column17: Carried out by Lake City Light Dragoons, possible that this group may have been a Red Shirt Group left over from 1876
column36: from an 11/10/98 e-mail message from  Bruce Baker (bebaker@mail.awod.com)
